clip.quote: Instead of waiting for the phone to ring, you have to make it ring for somebody else.
clip.why_clipworthy: It challenges agents to change their approach to lead generation in a downturn market.
clip.suggested_hook: Are you still waiting for the phone to ring? Here's why you need to flip the script.
